And so on until a player runs out of cards in his/her hand and moves to playing their face-up table cards followed by their face-down table cards (but without getting to see those first).4. The game ends when a player has no more cards, including table cards, to play.The "Karma cards" cause twists like forcing another player to pick up the entire discard pile, or to move the card from the bottom of the pile to the top, or other game-changing surprises.My son and I played it together in a game that I called after the first hour. Turns out, the fewer players you have the longer the game is. The next time we played with three friends in a game that lasted around 20 very fun-filled minutes. It's now one of our favorite games to play when we have company.As far as an age range, I think kids as young as 8 could easily understand how to play this while there's no upper-end to a player's age because it's fun for adults, too.

Nothing works as good as Bar Keepers Friend on stainless steel. Nothing. It is also brilliant at cleaning fiberglass tubs, including the ground-in dirt on textured bath mats. When I need a scouring powder, this is the only commercial product I reach for.

Our old, drafty windows do nothing to keep out winter's cold so this stuff is an annual must-have. For some reason, I bought the "roll-on" version this year -- maybe I thought it would be easier -- and I was far less pleased with it than the regular stuff. Even though I read the tips here in the reviews about applying tape to the top of the window anyway, I still find this stuff more fiddly to install than the type that doesn't "roll-on". It also didn't shrink as tightly as the standard version, so the plastic was more detectable. Even so, it did the job of keeping cold drafts out all winter.

On cold winter nights (or evenings after a bit too much wine) I dread having to stand at the sink washing makeup off of my face. Since I'm at a certain age where ignoring skin care is just not an option, I needed a convenient solution and have found it in these wipes. They do an excellent job of removing makeup. I use one side and start with my eye makeup, which is the most stubborn, before giving the rest of my face the once-over. When I flip the wipe and use the other side I hardly ever find any residue left behind. That's impressive!Also, as someone with sensitive skin, I've noticed that my skin tone has improved since I started using these. Maybe it's because I'm no longer not exposing my face to the hot water otherwise needed to remove makeup? Whatever the reason, I love these things!

I have very, very dry skin so going without lotion is just not an option. Being able to apply this in the shower while my conditioner soaks into my hair has drastically shortened my morning routine. My skin is soft, and the fragrance isn't overpowering, so I'm quite happy.

I bought two of these: one for my laptop, and one for my car's rear window. At first I was worried: when I lifted the clear tape on top of the design it looked like I'd need to attach the stickers one piece at a time. Then I read the instructions. (Duh, right?) After smoothing the clear tape more firmly onto the design I was able to peel it back with all of the blue pieces in their place and then transfer them to both laptop and window. After going over it with a credit card to smooth away air bubbles I gently pulled the transfer tape away and, voila!, a gorgeous Tardis on my laptop and car. Love, love, love them!

I bought this to hide a permanently-stained spot on the floor next to my guest bed where a visitor spilled a bottle of some medicine that turned my ivory carpet almost black. Nothing would get that spot out, so I decided to throw a small rug over it. Small is a good description of this: it isn't the size advertised, but as I had company coming I didn't have time to send it back. Imagine my surprise when I went to clean the room after that guest had departed and found that the dye from this rug had joined the stain on my carpet, too. Horrible thing. I tossed the rug and would never, ever buy from this company again.

I bought these to include in a college care package since buying laundry supplies is seldom at the top of a student's list of priorities, and yet it's an unavoidable necessity. The recipient was thrilled at being able to put two or three pacs in a bag and take them to the laundry room in the basement of the dorm rather than juggle a bottle of detergent and a stain fighter. Apparently the scent was a vast improvement over his ordinary aroma, too, because he said he's had girls walk up, sniff his jacket, and tell him how great it smells. (Odd. Back in my day we just said "Hi" and batted our eyelashes. I guess mating rituals have changed a lot since I was young.)

Oh, Cheez-It, how I want to hate you but I just can't. I love that you use 100% real cheese, and that dash of paprika gives you such a nice zing. It's the preservatives I don't approve of, you see. Are they really necessary? Does anyone ever open a box and not consume them pretty much that same day? Really? REALLY???

I bought these to include in a college Care Package for a friend's son. He gave them rave reviews, especially since they have a pull-top lid. Apparently, operating a can opener is a challenge after a hard night "studying".
Muir Glen is our go-to for canned tomato sauce. It has a fresh, bright taste and we love that it's organic.

I bought these to add to a care package for a college student. What college kid doesn't like SpaghettiOs after a hard night of partying, I mean studying, right? The recipient gave them rave reviews and said they reminded him of his childhood. Okay, then. Sounds like a passing grade to me!

These little capsules are handy when you don't feel like waiting for the kettle to boil just to make one cup. They have a nice, light mint flavor that's not overpowering but, in all honesty, could be a bit stronger. The big selling point, from what I can see, is that since they're #6 plastic they're easily recyclable; most K-Cups are made from #7 plastic that few recycling centers accept. The Amazon price shocked me, though. Over a dollar per capsule? I guess if fair-trade, certified organic, and recyclable are important to you then money isn't the object. For me, though, at that price I'd just as soon go with a tea bag that I can then compost.

There's a reason this game is a perennial family favorite: the play is simple enough for very young children to understand, but playing well can challenge even adults. You don't need much space to play: a small table or, if you're traveling, a cookie sheet on a player's lap in the back seat of the car will do.

I read this book the week following my own husband's death. Knowing it's a memoir, I wasn't looking for a self-help book but, rather, for insight into another woman's feelings in the long days and longer nights following the loss of her spouse. What I found, instead, was a screed written by a weak, petty, odious woman who never once discloses that she remarried just 13 months after her husband's death, which she portrayed as so devastating that it sent her spiraling close to substance abuse and mental illness. At the point she angrily rants about the gifts of fruit baskets and food sent by well-meaning friends and acquaintances -- gifts she found so offensive that she somehow overcame her torpor and out to buy additional garbage cans so she could throw them away. Yes: she chucked them in the trash, rather than giving them away or donating to a shelter or food pantry. Perhaps this was cathartic for her, but I found it indicative of a self-involved, selfish, and shallow woman.

I bought this as a gift for my son who, like millions of kids, has become a major Minecraft fan. He says this is very helpful and he uses it quite a bit. Unfortunately, he has the Kindle version and wants the paperback but it looks like the author has pulled the paperback from printing at CreateSpace for some reason.

This is a fun, fast-paced game that's perfect for kids and adults to play together. I bought it along with several other 2+ person games to play with my teenaged son who'd rather spend 24/7 playing video games in his room. Most nights we try to fit a game of some kind in while dinner is in the oven, and Gubs has been a welcome addition to our rotation which also includes Mr. Jack, Mastermind, and Morels. Since he loves Pokemon and Yu-gi-oh he's used to card-based games, whereas I'm not, but we both truly enjoy this one! I recommend making a copy of the cheat sheet that explains what the various cards do, though. Although we really enjoy playing it together since it gives us bonding time, I knew Gubs was a real winner when my son had a friend over and, after teaching him how to play, they spent the next four hours playing it -- and never once playing the video game they'd intended!

I'm crazy about Elizabeth Peters' Amelia Peabody series. The writing is snappy, the dialogue is fun, and the stories are quite entertaining. Peters has created such a smart, funny protagonist that I often find myself laughing out loud while reading, and getting strange looks from people at the coffee shop.

I bought this game to play with my teenaged son who would otherwise spend all of his time playing video games in his room. Although it took us a couple of rounds to grasp the rules (not that they're hard, it was just different from anything we'd played), once we caught on we found this to be quite a bit of fun. The artwork is cute, and the concept is very original. We can get a game in at the kitchen table while dinner is in the oven (and you do need a long table since you're laying out 8 cards in a row), which is just enough time to have fun but not so much that he starts whining about wanting to get back to his video games. We rotate this with playing Mr. Jack, Gubs, and Mastermind -- depending on our moods. Spending a half-hour a night hanging out with your teen might not sound like much, but it's really done wonders for our relationship: we talk more about what's going on in his life, he listens better to me now that I'm spending regular one-on-one time with him, and the teenage drama has plummeted. Plus, we're having fun!

I bought a number of 2+ person board games to play with my teenage son who has been spending far too much time playing video games by himself. Mr. Jack has become one of our favorites, in part because we can get in a game while dinner is in the oven, and in part because it's a fun way to put our brains to work. Very clever, and very enjoyable. I wish there were more great 2+ games like this!

K.M. Weiland explains the process of outlining your novel in a very approachable, understandable manner. That said, if you've bought the original book, as I did, you'll find the material in the workbook rather redundant. Maybe that's just me; while reading the original book I took notes and worked through the steps in my writing journal, making a workbook unnecessary. If you prefer a guided approach, this book is just as thorough as the original format.

I've been using this since it came out, at at 47 years old my skin looks fantastic and still wrinkle-free! The 2-step exfoliation process is so easy to do: gently massage the orange microderm abrasion treatment into your skin for a minute, follow with the peel activator gel for another minute, then rinse. I usually do this in the shower at night, since it's easiest to wash off there, around three times a week. Afterwards, my moisturizer (also Olay Regenerist) sinks in so well and the following morning my skin is bright, even-toned, and incredibly soft.

Tissues are necessary when you've got allergies like mine. This is a pretty good price on them. I still despise the way these tissues shed lint. Sometimes I wonder if that's not intentional: the more lint, the more stuff to make you sneeze, the more you need these tissues. I've tried "hypoallergenic" ones but they just scratch my face terribly, so I'm stuck with these for now.

I have to admit, I was hesitant to try this tablet, but I had some experience with the 7" iRulu kids tablet and thought this would be worth a try!  I am an iPad owner as well as owning the new Amazon Fire and a Galaxy Tab 3.  My overall experience has left me very impressed at this price point!  It was not sluggish in any way.  I was able to load it up with apps and movies and it was great!Highlights:~ Large 10" screen, but lighter weight than you would expect~ Fluid picture for viewing movies~ No freezing of apps while playing games or viewing pages~ Amazing value for the price point!~ Android based tablet so you have a huge selection of apps to choose from  You can choose from apps/games from iRULU or you can go directly to the Google Play Store. I didn't spend a dime and I had three Disney movies ready to play!  In addition, we had PBS Kids, Disney Junior, Pinterest, Facebook, etc.  Not only can you work straight from the apps, but you can open your browser and search as you please!  I went window shopping (and dreaming) about cruises while I was viewing!  You can even use it to take pictures!  I have uploaded several pictures for your review.  It is a photo journey from the minute you open the box to watching a movie!  I hope the pictures are able to show you the clarity!  Overall, I was left impressed with the iRULU eXpro  X1s 10.1 inch Tablet!  Please know that I was given this product free of charge in exchange for an unbiased review.  I would be happy to answer any questions you have or take additional pictures!  Please note that my pictures were taken with a cell phone camera and not edited in any way.  I

Watching what you eat doesn't always means depriving yourself of a small treat!  Whether your a diabetic or someone eating a low carb diet, these are a handy snack.  I personally found them to be the right size!  They had great flavor.  I did find them to be a little pricey so it makes me not want to share with my husband, but I do because he loves them.  I will definitely buy them again!  The only reason for 4 stars versus 5 stars is price. I think there are other low carb snacks that fit the budget better, but for the occasional treat, these worked well for us!

The IZOD Sueded Fleece tops are one of the few that my husband will actually wear.  He owns several. He is small framed (5'8" and 140 lbs) and a medium is generous in size on him. A small would be too short.  He loves it. It washes well and the color remains sharp. If you are looking for others that are similar to this, the IZOD 1/4 zip sueded fleece is also very nice. Solid 5 stars from a repeat buyer.

My son needs insulated work gloves for his snow removal in the winter. He also uses them for cold days when he is doing late Fall landscaping. Last year, I purchased two pair of Carhartt Men's Chill Stopper Waterproof Insulated Work Glove at $40 each for him.  By comparison, I like these much better. There are no loose stitches, the fit is nice, love the flexible grip and insulation. It's a comfortable glove, even for me!Highlights:~ Price point is GREAT!  Low price, high quality!~ Quality - no loose stitches, nice fit w/flexibility~ Size - fits true to sizeI have posted some pictures of the gloves for your review.  It shows the quality up close and personal!

Eukanuba has always been a trusted brand for pets, but as new dog foods arrive on the shelves, you may find their are better out there from a nutritional standpoint.  Please note that this is not my dog's primary source of nutrition, it is added to their dry dog food.  From minute one, both the 100 pound Lab and the 19 lb Shitzu began going crazy when they heard me open the can.  They have both been eating it for three days now and we have had no upset stomachs or loose stool.  It was an easy transition and they are happy. I would certainly purchase it again and add it to the variety we choose from now.

Vera Bradley products are much loved in our house.  My daughters both enjoy having a small purse and this really works! It has all the compartments she asked for and a place for her phone!  Can be used as both a wristlet or a crossbody!  I love the bold and vibrant colors! It really makes a statement!  5 star quality - great price point and perfect for gift giving!

Playskool is a trusted brand in our house and Rescue Bots are much loved. We love the quality and how they trigger imaginative play! Little do the kids know that the transforming portion of the play is actually strengthening their hands!  We own several of the Rescue Bots, but this one is a particular favorite!  The boys love transforming him and turning him into a tow truck! With one simple motion, he is in bot mode to save the day! Nice quality that holds up well even under the roughest of play!  Great gift!  The kids all love them!

I am more than pleasantly surprised with the iRULU 7 inch Quad Core Kids Tablet WITH PARENTAL CONTROLS!  It is speedy with no lag, has a clear, sharp picture and is a great size for kids or adults on the go!Highlights:~ Parental Controls which allow you to control how much screen time your child can have before a break.~ Comes with rubber bumper case, so no need to buy anything extra.~ Get Apps/Movies/Books/Music directly from iRULU (coupons included!) or from the Google Play Store~ Set your Home Screen for the child version or adult version~ Very easy to navigate  I have to admit, I am more than pleasantly surprised by the iRULU 7 inch Quad Core Kids Tablet!  The battery arrived charged enough for me to get started right from the box.  If you are giving this as a gift, it is quite easy to set up in advance and have it ready for your child!  The tablet is very easy to navigate.  Internet Safety is everything to me. I like that I can keep the children protected with the advanced parental controls. Not only can I limit what they see and do, but I can limit their screen time.  I can simply input my password to extend their play time, if desired.  I was amused when I was playing around with it and I got the message for me to "take a break". You can set the message you want your child to receive.  For me, this was a true bonus!  I added the PBS Kids and Netflix apps to see how well television shows and movies played! Flawless! As you can see, I added a ton of apps and still had plenty of room for more!  The battery life and wifi connection has been great! I played for about two hours the first night and went from 100% battery life to 86%  I think that is a good indication of your play time!  I had no difficulty getting a wifi signal in any room of the house or out on our deck.  Overall, I am still impressed with this tiny powerhouse!  No, it isn't an iPad, but I am all for the price point with the safety of parental controls! ** I have added several pictures for your review!  Please note that any clarity or light/dark issue is from the camera and definitely not the tablet. I wanted to give you an idea of what you would be receiving! I'd be happy to take more pictures or answer any questions you may have!iRULU rules! I will be looking at their other products with a new perspective now that I have had the opportunity to try this one. Please note that I have been given this tablet in exchange for an honest and unbiased review.

OtterBox has been a trusted brand in the industry for many years. They are known to build cases that last and cases that protect your investment.  No one wants to see a cracked screen or a damaged phone.  Other cases may be fancy and have pretty decorations, but it's not worth it when you have to spend $180 just to replace your screen. (Yes, I have a teen daughter!)  We have owned many OtterBox cases over the years, so this was an easy pick. I trust OtterBox to protect my phone.  This version of the OtterBox is not as bulky as previous models and doesn't add all that much extra bulk to your phone. Yes, it does add some, but I am all for protecting our phones.  It has a sleeker design with the same OtterBox protection!  It fits my iPhone 6s perfectly and I'm very happy with it!  We are very pleased and have no problems recommending this case to others!

OtterBox has been a trusted brand in the industry for many years. They are known to build cases that last and cases that protect your investment.  No one wants to see a cracked screen or a damaged phone.  We own two of these, so it is a relatively easy review for me to write.  This version of the OtterBox is not as bulky as previous models and doesn't add all that much extra bulk to your phone. Yes, it does add some, but I am all for protecting our phones.  It has a sleeker design with the same OtterBox protection!  We are very pleased and have no problems recommending this case to others or buying another in the future!

This is my second Four Paws Metal Hands-Free Gate. I want to love it! It is sturdy and works great, but this is my second quality control issue that I have had.  My first gate had hardware that wouldn't thread properly. Customer Service was prompt in replacing it.  This gate arrived sealed, but with brown (rust??) stains on it? I am so very disappointed. I tried removing it with Chlorox Clean Up and  a Mr. Clean Eraser, but only some came off. I have uploaded pictures for your review. It is certainly not a piece that I can or will use in my home...as I am sure you can understand by seeing the pictures.  If you get one that is good, then you will enjoy the hands-free aspect and that is tall so the typical dog doesn't jump over it.  It does hold sturdy to the wall using pressure mounted screws.  I just can't get past the quality control issues. I know that "things happen", but this is the 2nd gate that I will have had to contact customer service about. If you want a premium price, you have to deliver a premium product. No one wants to be disappointed when they open the box and cannot use their item.

Let me begin by tell you that I love the Saucony brand and they are my go to brand for sneakers. I am that jeans and sneakers kind of person who actually needs to wear sneakers due to a foot injury I sustained.  I love my Fastwitch and then the Cohesion by Saucony. I saw these and thought I'd give them a try!  They fit as expected and found them to be as comfortable as my other Saucony's. I did not order a half size up as others have suggested. They fit exactly as my Fastwitch and a smidge smaller than my Cohesion, if you are familiar with either of these by Saucony.  The colors are bright and happy (See picture below!).  Great price point on these! I purchased them because I couldn't afford to replace my Saucony Fastwitch this week!  I love them! I am happy to have found something else I can wear on my feet!  Now I need to find a pair in orange!

I have to admit, I was a little hesitant about ordering this little fellow!  I am so glad I did! He is amazing and definitely will light up our tree!  Love the detail, the lights that change color and something about his little red hat!  Great price point, great value and a great gift!  I have posted a few pictures to help you get an idea of the various color lights he has.  Comes with battery installed! Just pull the tab and you are set to have fun!

The SmartLab Girls Only! Secret Message Lab is well made and comes with supplies for you and a friend!  Send secret messages to a friend and learn how to do it!  Although the ages are 8 and up, I worked with a 7 year old on this and we had fun.  My only regret was that I didn't have purple cabbage in the house to boil, but there were enough other activities that I did have the supplies for (or were included with the kit!)Highlights:~ Value and Educational~ UNIQUE - something fun, different and scientific~ Well made~ Good price point for gift giving!~ Loved the two quality "kits" - one for each girl!  The book gives you several ways to send messages to be decoded.  We only were able to do a few of them on the first day because I didn't have a few of the supplies necessary. It was a lot of fun to write with the wax crayon and then use the ultra violet light to see the message!  We also were able to fold paper (origami) in the shape of a heart and create a message inside.  In addition, we created our own vocabulary to decode messages using the decoder wheels. All in all, time well spent - educational and fun.  NOTE:  We opted to laminate our decoder wheel and use a brass holder to keep them together. This way, we will be sure they last a long time!  They are heavier duty paper (waxy cover), but this will make them last even longer!

We enjoyed the Scientific Explorer Ice Age Creator Kit. It comes with everything you need for the Wooly Mammoth's habitat - icy pond and snowy landscape with ice on the trees.  I have uploaded several pictures for you. Please note:  This project was completed with a 7 year old.Highlights:~ Easy to follow instructions!~ Nice quality Wooly Mammoth!~ Educational and fun!  Create ice crystals, snow and ice for your Wooly Mammoth in his habitat.  The instructions are easy to follow, but please note that this is a one and done type of kit.  You will receive enough to create your landscape, but then you are on your own if you want to make more snow or crystals.  The Wooly Mammoth is nice quality and he will be yours to keep for a long time!  We thoroughly enjoyed creating this habitat for our friend, "Wooly".  The kids were able to make the ice on their own.  I helped measure the water to make the snow. Their eyes LIT UP when the snow just kept growing! It was great!  The kids lacked the patience to wait for the crystals to develop, but when they looked at it the next morning the said, "OH WOW".  For me, this is a great gift to give to a child. It helps incorporate science, learning and sensory all in one!  I like the price point! It makes a great birthday party gift for a child's classmate or that hard to buy for child that has everything. There is no way they will have this one!  I am looking forward to trying additional science kits by Scientific Explorer.

I purchased both the Creative Converting Milestone Celebrations 80th Birthday Napkins along with the coordinating plates.  First, let me tell you just how hard it is to find anything for an 80th birthday. I was thrilled to see the vibrant happy colors on these napkins!  My mom's favorite color is purple, so I was easily able to coordinate around these!  Nice quality and your typical price point for celebration napkins!  Solid 5 stars for making a great birthday memory!

For anyone that has gone "low carb", you know that you get your fill of protein and veggies after awhile. The rest of the family is indulging in a treat and this easily can be YOUR treat.  I didn't find myself missing out on that Halloween candy yesterday. I had my own small Atkins Chocolate Caramel Mousse Treat and I was perfectly happy. No, it is not filling and it is not a meal replacement.  If you are looking for a bar that has protein and is more filling, please see the meal replacement bars that Atkins offers. This is only mean to be a low carb small treat and it does just that. It is small though, but I was content.

The Mpow Apple MFI Certified Lightning to USB charger has worked out great for us! I have it in a docking station so that everyone can charge their devices in our family room, if they need to.  It has fit with all the various cases, including Otterboxes - works well on the iPhone 6s, 5C and all the other phones that my kids and their friends bring to my house!  I never expect a charging cable to last long, but this one is doing great with no signs of wear.

These were purchased for my college student. The fit was true to size. She is only 5'2" so they were a little long, but certainly not enough to keep her from enjoying them!  Price point was excellent!  Nice and cozy!  The waistline wasn't "mom pants" and they aren't low either - just falling naturally below the waistline.  Highly recommended as a gift, stocking stuffer or a gift to your college student if you don't want a pair for yourself !!

SEE PICTURES! Color is accurate as shown!  I just purchased mine and thankfully, did not read the reviews prior to purchasing.  I might have passed on a great $12 lightening deal mat!  The color is accurate as shown. It is a nice heavy duty mat .  The Apache Mills mat is of great quality and has a terrific price point! I would have been happy at full price.  The mat is a nice size and we have it on our deck by our sliders. Solid 5 star!

When I was a little girl, Pie Face was released for the first time. It was in the toy catalog and it was on my every Christmas list for years!  I never got it. Well clearly, my parents weren't as much fun as I am as a parent. It does not make this "big mess" as they said.  It's a fun game and it keeps the kids laughing and laughing!  When I saw this was released again, it was a dream come true. I couldn't believe it! I had searched for it for years hoping to get it! I could never afford the online auction prices and yes, I had to fulfill that childhood dream that didn't come true.  I purchased it on backorder and then received a second game!  Yes, I like being prepared!  Assembly:  Easy, 1-2-3  Ease of use? Very easy and fun for all ages! I think the younger kids will like it more, but honestly, who wouldn't like this challenge??  Clean up?  A breeze.Pie Face! is a fun game to play with the kids. You can use whipped cream or the wet sponge as we opted for!  I will let them use the whipped cream on Christmas Eve!  We had no issues with our game coming apart during play. It is not a heavy duty game by any stretch of the imagination though!So, who is going to get the pie in their face? Are you ready to take on the challenge?  See the pics posted below!  As you can see, the kids are having a blast with it!

The Four Paws Metal Closing Dog Gate is of sturdy quality and is big!  Our 100 pound Labrador couldn't jump it if he wanted to.  A first impression is a lasting impression.  Ours had a piece of defective hardware, so I am working on getting a replacement screw.Please note:  I misread the description and assumed it was adjustable up to a wide doorway, but that is not the case. This will fit the doorway only if it is between 35.75-39.75" wide.  It is too large for a standard doorway.  So please be sure and measure first.  Installation is very simple and straight forward. You will have this up on your doorway in just a matter of moments. It comes in one piece and not sections that you have to assemble.  Simply pop in the 4 pressure mounted screws and you are good to go. It does come with 4 additional caps and screws that you can put into your woodwork if you happen to have a dog that is determined.  When our dog was a puppy, we purchased the Carlson Pet Gate (only 31 inches in height, but expands from 29-44 inches and half the price) and that has been fine for us. Keeping in mind, the wider the doorway, the less sturdy that gate is.  Unfortunately, our gate arrived with one pressure mounted screw that simply will not thread.  It happens and I certainly will not hold that against the company. I will give this gate a 3 star rating while I wait for my replacement screw.  .  I will update my review upon receiving my replacement pressure mounted screw. I was hoping to use this on our front door on Halloween! As adorable as a 100 lb Lab can be, it can be intimidating for anyone coming to the door to his friendly face.  The Four Paws Metal Auto Closing Dog Gate is very sturdy and one piece construction.  It is great for that perfectly wide doorway and the determined dog.  It does have a higher price point that the adjustable gates, but this is taller and sturdier at that width!  I have posted a picture below so that you can see the width and get a feel for the construction!

I was definitely hesitant when I purchased the Carba-Nada Low Carb Egg Fettuccine Pasta. It's not even that I'm a pasta lover, but sometimes, it just fills the void.  I went ahead and added this to my order as an Add On item for $7.  Packaging - arrived just as pictured, there are no surprises there.  There was also no broken noodles.  Flavor - I thought they were great and even better was that my husband liked them!  He is a total pasta guy! I was surprised to see him eat an entire bowl of them!  Cost - $7 for one bag is high when you consider a package of 6 through Subscribe and Save is only $16.55  Here is the link to that item so you can buy in bulk and definitely save money right here at Amazon!  Al Dente Carba-Nada Egg Fettuccine, 10-Ounce Bags (Pack of 6)  I just made that purchase, so yes, I am now a repeat customer!  The only thing I might  add is that these are a bit firmer than your regular pasta - even when cooked  a couple minutes longer. I am fine with that!  Just pointing it out to you!  Today, we are making chicken noodle soup and will be adding a few of last nights leftover noodles to our soup!  I added a quick pic of my husband's bowl last night!  Mine was not served like that, but as you can see, he was totally happy!

Let's just say I was intrigued to try the Hachiko Smart Dog Sensor.  I could think of several useful purposes! As a parent, I would love the kids to be the "owners" and log when they have fed and walked the dog.  From a spouse standpoint, I would like to know if either one of us has given the dog his medicine.  Most of all, I love seeing the activity just like my own activity tracker.  First impressions:  Packaging is simple, but so is the product.  Set Up:  Set up was very simple. Download the app on your iPhone 5 or later and you are ready to begin. I used this on an iPhone 6S and the app was flawless.  Next, it is time to attach the band to the device and wrap it around the dog's collar.  The device comes with two bands and even with the Lab, we needed to use the small band.  Note:  I do worry that this is not going to last over time and hopefully, this is something that will be improved upon.  I can see looking for on an acre of land.  After that, set up your profile, pair the device and tah dah, you are ready to begin tracking activities!  We first tested the device with some simple running back and forth with the ball. Once the dog came within the distance of my phone, I was able to see his activity. (Think about this!  You have hired a dog walker and you go away on vacation.  When you get home, you can see just how far you dog walked!)  Of course, you can add when your dog has been walked, pooped, peed, had medicine or even had a treat.  As an adult, I don't have much use for this function because I am usually the one feeding them.  I certainly will use it if I need to record this information for the vet during a time of illness, which does happen.  I think the absolute perfect person for the Hachiko Smart Dog Sensor is a child .  Not only will they love tracking their dogs activity, but you are also encouraging their own activity tracking!  Not only that, but people can take photos of their dog and save them in the app!  I would love to see this activity tracker take another step and have a camera! That would be so much fun!UPDATE:  Unfortunately, I feel I should I update this review.  Our dog's tracker was lost somewhere on our property last evening. I had a feeling that the thick rubber bands were not going to hold the tracker in place and I was right.

Overall, these are awesome disposable cups!  The Hefty College Cups features college teams that we all love and are proud of!  They aren't as thick as the well known red cup, but these do the job well. There is no need to waste and have them thicker. The price point is great and makes for a fun conversation piece! After all, who just wants red or blue? I definitely have to have the Florida Gators next!  Please see pictures for size reference!

It has been several years since I have worn Calvin Klein Eternity!  It wasn't because I didn't love it though!  I just couldn't fit it in the budget.  I am a mother of four. My usual attire is jeans and sneakers with a sweater, but there is something that feels good about adding a spray of Eternity to you!Highlights:1. Packaging - First impressions are lasting impressions! Nice box, bottle with a silver spray top2. Fragrance - LOVE IT!  One spray will do you, possibly two. (My 16 year old even loved it on me!)3. Long lasting. 12 hours later, there is a hint of Eternity still with me!4. Value - You get what you pay for.  Well worth the price point for the quantity.  Overall, I love the Calvin Klein Eternity!  It makes a great gift for yourself or someone special!  I'm not sure why there are negative reviews from so long ago, but in my personal opinion, this is the real deal. I have posted pictures below of what you will receive!  As you can see, it's quite tempting! I wish you could smell a picture!  Love it!3.

LeapFrog has been a trusted brand in our family for many years.  We have owned all of the LeapPad versions along the way and currently own the Platinum.  In addition, I consider us a tech savvy family that owns both iPad's, Fire Tablets and so much more.  For the little ones, I believe that internet safety is a priority and that we can and should find products that keep our children safe.  Highlights:~ Set up is a breeze (all wireless and battery comes somewhat charged so you can begin!)~ Built in rechargeable battery~ Huge app library with fun and educational games, books, videos and music! (Yes, Paw Patrol and Frozen are there too!)~ Sharp and clear graphics, fluid movement~ SAFE internet searching - with KID SAFE SEARCHES  I have so many highlights and there are more!  First impressions are lasting impressions!1.  Love the packaging and set up was a breeze. It comes with everything you need to begin enjoying your LeapFrog Epic right way!2. Your Epic will come preloaded with apps, but I purchased a few additional!  I purchased the $20 LeapFrog Digital Download Card at a discounted price here at Amazon ($13) and combined it with a LeapFrog coupon (30% off).  Here is the link to the download card! LeapFrog Digital Download Card3.  Easy to set up - even a place for 6 "favorite" apps or simply swipe and find the rest!4. My personal favorite was finding Scholastic Reader!  The little one's favorite was Jewel Train!  There are many fun and engaging games available on the new Epic. In many ways it is similar to the previous version, Platinum, but LeapFrog took it a step ahead and gave the kids what they wanted. They gave them the real feel of a tablet and the safety of their own internet access.  I have taken several pictures for your review! I hope you enjoy the Epic as much as we do!

I really like the Lionel Polar Express Imagineering Train Set!  I wanted to "love" it because we are huge Geotrax and Polar Express fans in our house!  I think if the price point were lower or if a few extra pieces of track were included, I could definitely see myself loving this toy. The kids, 3 and 5 love it!Highlights:~ Easy to put together and sturdy!~ Easy coupling of trains~ Fun imaginative play with the Polar Express and Christmas!BONUS FUN:  This track also supports the old Geotrax trains (SEE PICTURES!).  The track is not interchangeable with Geotrax.  Overall, the Lionel Polar Express Imagineering is a kid powered train set that opens the world of imagination and the freedom to expand with other Imagineering sets, such as John Deere, Crayola, Batman and more!  Expansion track is sold separately!  It is sturdy and fun.  Please note that 6 feet of track is included, but it is not a 6 foot layout.  The absolute only reason for 4 stars versus 5 is the price point for this particular set.  I would have liked to have seen more track come with it, even if only a couple extra straight pieces so more children could play at once.  I have taken several pictures for your review!  As you can see, I have taken pics of a couple of our Geotrax to show you how they work well on this track!  Nice set! Will certainly make a nice gift for your Polar Express fan!

I am a huge fan of Melissa & Doug products, but I felt the  3-D Fanciful friends missed the mark. I tried this with a 7 year old and a 5 year old. The 7 year twisted the cap and "snap", that was the end of that pen. The whole blending part was a joke. She was very frustrated trying to fit the pieces together to created anything worthwhile. We ended up coloring the pieces and using them to create our own creation glued on paper.

Overall, for price and play value, the Disney Junior Super Stretchy Game is a fun way to keep the little ones moving on those rainy/snowy blah days!  I have now pulled this out several times over the last week and each time I am greeted by squeals of delight!  The idea is the same as the adult version that we have all loved throughout the years, but this mat is scaled down to fit the smaller children. I played with a 3 and 5 year old and they both loved it.  How can you go wrong? Price point is great, play value, movement, educational value and all their favorite characters right there!  The only reason I am giving it 4 stars instead of 5 is because I would have liked to have seen a bit higher quality mat. I don't think I have room to complain at this price point though!

I purchased the miWorld Dairy Queen Restaurant Starter Set as a gift for a 7 year old. She is very crafty. I was so happy to see her excitement at her birthday party when all the children ran forward to see this miniature surprise!  It comes as shown - walls, floor and accessories.  Please NOTE:  It does NOT come with a doll and that must be ordered separately.  It does fit several other dolls, so it wasn't a problem that our doll didn't arrive in time.  Each playset fits together. This particular 7 year old declared she wanted them ALL for Christmas so her Barbie family could have places to shop!  As you can see by the picture below, we had no issues at all with the sturdiness of the item, but keep in mind, she is 7.  You may have different results if you give this to a younger child.  The only reason I am giving this a 4 star instead of 5 star is because "Starter Set" to me implies that you have everything you need to begin playing with miWorld.  It does not come with a doll, so really, it's not a "starter" set, but an "add on" set.  Perhaps that is just semantics, but if you are giving this as a gift, I think it's important to know if the child will have a doll that size on hand to play with their new miWorld. Personally, I would rather pay a few dollars more and have it all inclusive than be charged more for a doll.  Overall, it is a great set and I do highly recommend it!  You can also download the app and play the game!

Love, love, love this set!  Although the manufacturer recommended this for children 4 and up, a 3 year old has done just fine with it!  It is the typical Hot Wheels quality that we have all learned to love as a trusted brand over the years!  It comes with not one, not two, but THREE Monster Jam trucks!  It is very easy to assemble, it does not require batteries and most of all, it does what it says it does!  Here is the bonus!  Do you love Blaze and the Monster Machines?  This particular Blaze works with this set!  It is not a Hot Wheels, but it's a definite perk to owning both!  Here is the link for it:  Fisher-Price Nickelodeon Blaze and the Monster Machines Blaze  I couldn't believe it worked  See the pictures below! It's a photo journey from the beginning!  The trucks that were captured in the Dragon's mouth were sent there by a 3 year old!  It has been a lot of fun and we look forward to playing with more Monster Jam sets!

What a delicious treat we had this week! The Hershey's Milk Chocolate and Dark Chocolate Caramels are individually wrapped. Each has an amazing amount of goodness!  There is always a fight over who gets the Milk Chocolate and who gets the Dark Chocolate, but I have to admit, both are very good.  The Dark Chocolate is not bitter at all, but yet mild and smooth!  All in all, a great tin to have on hand and refill when you have guests!  Makes a great gift to give this holiday season as well!  It's not wimpy in size at all!  I had to hold it in two hands!  Oh and remember, dark chocolate is good for your heart, right? ;-) ENJOY!

Blaze and the Monster Machines are much loved in our house.  I purchased Blaze several weeks ago and he has been much loved, used and abused since then.  3-5 year old boys can play rough, but Blaze has held up really well!  I am very happy to have a second one so they can each have one now!  NOTE:  As you can see, the listing has been corrected to reflect the correct size. It's the same size a nice chunky Monster Truck would be - approx. 3".  So when you read the negative reviews, you might want to take that into account.  Blaze has bold and vibrant colors and he has brought much life to our collection of cars and trucks.  I would absolutely love a track built for Blaze and I hope that Fisher-Price comes out with one real soon!  Solid 5 stars - quality, price and a much loved friend!Edit:  Please note that we just tried Blaze in the Monster Jam Dragon play set and it worked!  See my pics there as well as he drives on the track and jumps through the Dragon's mouth!  Hot Wheels Monster Jam Dragon Buildup

We are always in need of extra surge protectors in our house. How do they just walk away?  I liked the idea of having a compact surge protector - less bulky and nice short cord. Absolutely perfect for my desk. Great in concept, but execution a bit flawed.  As with most surge protector, the Woods 6-outlet surge protector didn't really allow me to use all six. I managed to get my laptop, printer and lamp plugged in and that was about it.  I have taken a picture to show you just how close the outlets are to each other.  In some ways, this is my own fault for not realizing this "compact" size would take away from my use.  However, don't call it a 6-outlet Surge Protector if you can't use all 6. The outlets are tight, so be prepared to muscle them in.  For today, this will be fine.  I will have to keep looking for find a new use for this one.  I was hoping to mount it behind my desk so I didn't have to look at the wires, but I don't think I can do that now.  It does have the capability for mounting though!  If you only need a few outlets and love the compact nature, this would be a good choice for you! For us, it didn't work out.

For several years, I have wanted a pump for our giant bottle of mouthwash.  Of course, it is less expensive to buy the larger bottles, but who really wants to look at them on your vanity?  It always seemed like someone was spilling, dripping or using an excessive amount. Living in a family of 6, you notice these things.  The OXO Good Grips Pump Mouthwash Dispenser is awesome! I love it and ask that you take a look at my pictures!  Very easy to use. Simply unscrew the top, pour your mouthwash in and it is ready to go.  Push down on the top and you can dispense as much or as little as you would like. Pour into your own disposable cup or with the included plastic cup.  Of course, you can use it right from the canister if you like as well!  Not only was I pleased with the flawless design, but I thought of our many seniors that have difficulty lifting heavy bottles. What a perfect gift for them.  Even for my husband that has limited use of one hand, this is great!  No more trying to grasp that bottle!  I have only been using it a few days and have only positive things to say!  I will certainly update if I come across a flaw, but right now, I am giving this a solid 5 stars!

I purchased this Under Armour Men's Team Armour Fleece Hoody for my teen son. He typically wears a men's medium, but needs a large for length.  It fit him perfectly and as expected. He wears a large in American Eagle hoody's for comparison purposes.  The color is a sharp and deep black with the vibrant white small logo.  I had fully intended to give it to him for Christmas, but when it arrived, I couldn't help but give it to him. He put it on immediately and hasn't taken it off since! Very comfortable and current style!NOTE:  The waist band portion of the hoody is not stretchy so if you are on the thinner side, that area will be loose and the hoody will just hang straight down.

We have an enormous collection of Playskool Heroes Transformers Rescue Bots. We have been huge fans for a couple of years now.  I have to admit, until this particular play set, all have been a solid 5 star rating. Let me show you some pictures and let you know just what you are getting!  Yes, this does have to be assembled. It's just click and pop into place with easy to follow directions. Most of it does stay together once you firmly click it into place.  However, there will be times when a little one detaches a portion of it. It's not a solid structure like some of the other play sets that have been released.  The bot that is included is also not of the same quality as one of the other Rescue Bots you might own, he is lighter plastic, but loved nonetheless.  I think if you give it to a 3 year old, they will detach parts of it more than if you give it to a 4 or 5 year old. That's our experience anyway.  The 5 year old never has an issue. The 3 year old apparently uses a bit too much muscle!  The highlights for us were the working crane, the bot and the imaginative play value. I love that the ship has different areas for both play and storage.  What don't I like?  I knew you would ask!  Well, I am not a fan of cardboard cutouts at this price point.  For pennies more, two small figures could have and should have been included. I think then I would be able to say that this was a great price point.  Maybe Playskool will make them available someday. So far, they are hard to find in our area.

We have been proud owners of Fire products for many years. They have all passed the test of durability and dependability!  What a great price point!  You absolutely will not be disappointed!  When you first receive your Fire Tablet, you will need to update your software.  It will come with some battery life, so you are fine to do it right away, but plug it in to be sure.  This way, you will be ready to play!  Prior to my tablets arriving, I set up four profile accounts in my Amazon account for the kids. When I set this up, the profiles were right there and available for me to choose! So easy for each family member to have their own profile!  Next came, the test of speed!  Was this going to perform? Would we be able to watch a movie for real?  I added my apps and began to play Monsters Inc.  The clarity was great and the speed was flawless.  Of course, it is an additional bonus that I can save my extra movies and apps up in the Cloud and not have them all on the device at once if I don't want to.  In addition, one of the perks of Amazon Prime means that I can download movies and send them up to the Cloud when we don't need them on the device!  How about game playing?  My husband didn't skip a beat on his favorite games! I picked it up to play Candy Crush and it worked great!  I thought that for the price we might be getting an inferior product, but no, we did not!  I love the Amazon Tablet! What a great way to share the love. I purchased 6. One for me and 5 to donate to local families we will adopt for Christmas!  I am so excited because I know their eyes will sparkle when they open it!  Please see my pictures below!  I was amazed and you will be too!

We are huge Rescue Bots fan in this house! Why? Great quality, great value and they  inspire imaginative play.  We own several of them and have always been pleased!  This one comes to you as shown and is well made.  The boys are ages 3 and 5 and have fun playing with them!  My nephews always want to see which new ones we have when they come over.  If a toy can stand up to the test of 3 and 5 year old boys, they win with me! No one likes a broken toy.  Great gift!  Great value! Excellent price point!

As you can see by the pictures, we are having some great rainy day fun with our Max Tow Truck Mini Haulers and the new track pack!  Of course, everything shown comes in the package:  Red Mini Hauler, 4 pieces of track, connectors and suction cup connector.  If you have never owned or had the privilege to play with a Max Tow Truck Mini Hauler, they really do what they are suppose to do!  They have magnets in their vehicles and track. They can worth with the track or on the floor. They can also go straight up the refrigerator!  Assembly is easy and straight forward.  A 3 or 4 year old may have a little difficulty with the connectors on the first try, but they will get the hang of it!  If you assemble it, it will take you all of a minute!  With pull back action, rev up your Max Tow Truck Mini Hauler and send it up the red track!  I came back today to get a second set so we could race side by side!  Awesome toy and I hope they keep making them!  Makes a great gift!  Please note:  I added pictures of some of our other Mini Haulers just to show you the sturdy little haulers they are!

Burt's Bees has been a trusted brand in our house for many years. It is often our "go to" brand with those with sensitive skin and especially our little ones.  I love that it has no extra fragrance or additives in it.  Our babies have always done well with it!  The Burt's Bees Baby Bee Sweet Memories Gift Set is a nice gift for someone or for yourself!  It's a great way to try each product decide for yourself if it is something that works for your baby's skin.  My only complaint is a small one, but I will mention it because I feel I should.  I don't like the advertising that it comes in a "Keepsake Photo Box".  My box arrived ripped, so it really isn't sturdy enough to be a Keepsake Box.  Nice idea, but flawed in execution. You would need a sturdier box or even a tin for it to be of any value in that regard.  The other point to make is that teeny weeny bar of soap.  It's definitely adorable, but it is small.  Overall, it is a nice price point and does make a really nice gift!

The RoseArt Color KaBoom Airbrush art set is a fun in concept, but it does fall short on execution.  You will need 4 C batteries to start so be sure you have them on hand! Let's begin with what's in the box!In the box:•Motorized Airbrush (YOU will need to supply (4) C batteries)•10 Kaboom Sticks•5 Stencil sheets•20 Sheets of black paper•2 Art boards•2 Cords to hang your artwork  I am hoping that our experience is not everyone's experience, but we had a slight mess and the fun was short lived.  I worked with both a 16 and 6 year old on this one, just to give you an idea of what age group it is right for.  The 6 year old lost interest after the first blast of color and was more interested in trying to use the sprayer when he found the minimal color that was actually spraying. Again, that is probably just that age boy thing. An 8-11 year girl may be the perfect match for this art set.  The 16 year old created a background, let it dry and then went over it with another color with their name.  So again, there is a right age for this product, it just isn't 6 - not in our house anyway.  I was curious about refills because this will get some use by the 16 year old, but I was not able to find them here on Amazon.  I have to say that for the price point, if this is a one and done type item - it's way too expensive. Refills should be readily available.  I regret not being able to give set a better rating. 1. It uses a lot of battery life  2. It isn't meant for the target age group of 6+  I would not let a 6 year old by use this by themselves, unless you want their parents very annoyed at you. ;-)  3. Refills are not available at the stores I checked. Not even here at Amazon.  Thus making the price point way too high for what you get.  Great concept, but failed in execution.  Would love to see this improved upon!

This is the 4th Max Tow Truck Mini Hauler that I have purchased here at Amazon.  I have paid between $3.75 and $6 for each of them. We love them.  They are friction powered and have magnets in them. They go UP the refrigerator, across the floor or right on the red magnetic track that it comes with.  We find them to be well made and both the 3 and 5 year old haven't managed to destroy one yet.  I see they now sell a track pack and I've just ordered that as well. It comes with a suction cup, so the kids can really have fun racing their Max Tow Truck Mini Haulers up a hill!  I highly recommend these!  Great stocking stuffer or start your own car collection as we have!

I have to admit, I had high hopes for the Hefty Ultimate Easy Grip Plastic Cups, but I was left disappointed in the product. Overall, they are a nice size and have a vibrant color.  I have taken several pictures for your review. One is to show you size comparison and then a series of pictures to show you that they just aren't that sturdy. My son poured apple cider into one, picked it up and it spilled. He wasn't expecting the sides to just cave in with his grip. It's not like he is the Hulk or anything.  The grip would be a nice feature if the plastic were sturdy. I know I am use to the other leading brand (the red cup!), but this product feels inferior and reminds me of a wannabe.  I would love everything about the cup if the walls were sturdier.  Make it happen, Hefty!

How many ways do I love these lights?  A lot!Yes, the batteries ARE included!  I have attached pictures to show you what you will receive!I purchased these to make a milk container luminary with leaves and contact paper!  It was for a classroom originally, but then I wanted to try it!  Then they arrived and the mini pumpkins started to get carved!  They give off such a nice light!  Great for luminaries throughout the year! I am very pleased!

We are really enjoying the RoseArt Roto-Motion Mixer Dino Lab!  Finally, a toy that does what it says it does and is of decent quality!  Please see all my pictures below!  NOTE:  *I* overfilled the dino mold by a little bit and thus the reason for all the splatter. Clean up was incredibly easy and just wiped away!First, what's in the box and is it hard to assemble?  In the box you will find your laboratory to create dinosaurs, 3 different molds, tools for stirring, special plaster mix and paint set to paint your dinosaur!How long does it take and how easy is it?  Easy enough to do with a 3 year old by himself.  The 5 year old was able to do it alone.  We had the three year old counting to 60 while he turned the crank!  Fun and easy to do!  Start to finish...a total of 20 minutes tops. 15 of those minutes is drying time.  Add the water, add the mix, pour it into the mold, turn the crank! Easy as 1-2-3 !Overall, this has been a lot of fun and I am so looking forward to making more!  Many times you get craft kits or toys that are a total flop. This actually makes plaster dinosaurs!  I have opted to show you pictures from our first attempt so you can see just how easy it is. Please note that last picture was taken before that one was painted!  Woops. Guess I missed a picture somehow!

What a great toy at a phenomenal price!  Great quality! The Max Tow Truck Mini Haulers work on the floor, but they also have magical ability! They can climb up the refrigerator or the special track it comes with!  We now own three (and the mountains!)  and I just came back to order more track!  Such a great stocking stuffer! You can't beat this $3.75 price point, but if it were double the price, I would still buy it!  High quality! Fun! Durable enough for the play of both the 3 and 5 year old!  I can't say enough good things other than, I want more!

I just upgraded to an iPhone 6s and I was looking for a product to protect my phone and serve a useful purpose!  How many times have we all found ourselves in a position where we couldn't charge our phone?  In the hospital ER? The car? Just about anywhere!  This really solved one of my problems. I now carry the low profile Belkin car charger with me and this fits right in!  Being "on the go" is no longer an issue. I never have a dead battery...or that dreaded "Low battery" warning!  This fits the iPhone 6s beautifully and has a sleek look! I love the raised bumper and the included screen protector as well! My phone is well protected, looks nice and is ready to charge no matter where I am!

We are definite Thomas fans in this house and we love the quality of Fisher-Price products. Put the two together and you have a solid winning brand.  The Fisher-Price Thomas & Friends Wooden Railway Musical Melody Tracks Set is a quality train set that is very well made.  Please see the pictures I have taken to get a close up look!Please note: Yes, the wooden track is compatible with other brands that we have in the house.  Your set comes with everything you need to have a Thomas adventure right out of the box with no batteries needed. It comes with Thomas, a cargo car, cargo, etc.  The set up is very easy and of solid quality. It is a thin layout and will easily fit on your train table or on the floor like we have done.  The music is the xylophone attached to the bridge.  I expected a set that played music similar to the theme song. However, it is just a xylophone and unless your imagination is working for you, it does not remind me of the Thomas theme song at all.  The kids didn't recognize the sound as the theme song either.  They are 3 and 5 years old.  They are perfectly happy with the sounds though!  Overall, it is a really nice set that your children will love. If you don't have expectations of music that plays the Thomas theme song, you are fine.  If you content with xylophone sounds, which is perfectly fine, you will be pleased. I can picture a young toddler really enjoying this set.  We are enjoying the set very much, but I think the advertising needs to be tweaked just a bit.

Let me begin by telling you that I normally use Lancme products and I have medium skin (not oily/not dry).  I like my day lotion to have an SPF to help protect me from the sun's harmful rays. In addition, I believe that Burt's Bees is a trusted brand and I have used many of their products over the years.  They say that first impressions are lasting impressions.  I was immediately impressed with the packaging - a glass pump bottle enclosed in a nice box.  Please see the pictures below!  Let's put the product to the test !  I immediately pumped a bit out to see how "thick" it was. I was very pleased to see that it was much lighter and thinner than my normal product. (See picture below).  The fragrance was light. I honestly don't need any fragrance in my day cream, but this is  light and doesn't bowl you over!  Application was smooth and easy. A little goes a long way!  It didn't feel greasy or heavy.  You noticed almost immediately that your skin was hydrated and smooth.Highlights:~ Nice packaging - glass pump bottle in a box~ Pleasant light fragrance~ Not heavy, but light and easy to apply (Remember: a little goes a long way!)~ SPF 30 to help protect you from the sun's harmful raysOverall, I am very pleased with the quality of the product, the price point and the overall execution.  Time will tell if it does what it says it does. I am only at the beginning of my 87 day journey to see if the fine lines/wrinkles begin to disappear!  I will certainly update! Feel free to ask me any questions. See pictures below.

It's two days before your husband's birthday and he mentions Georges Seurat artwork. Now, how does one just pull this out of the air? Straight to Amazon I went!  Tah dah!  He mentions it on Saturday. I order it on Saturday and Monday morning it's at the front door. I swear Amazon has secret drones delivering all night long!  Anyway, back to the artwork!  I selected the 16x20 w/the black frame. I thought the black frame with the white matting would bring out more color and it did! See my pic below!  The frame is a decent quality and it does come with the sawtooth hanger on the back. It's not your art boutique quality frame, but I didn't want to spend $300 either. I thought the price point was fair and I am incredibly pleased with the quick delivery!  For the price point, the quality and print are definitely worth it.  It's a nice print on a plain wall where you are trying to bring some color and focus!  It made for a nice gift today!

I can't say enough nice things about this Antique Style Wine Cellar Key!  First impressions are lasting impression!  This is NOT some poorly made  cheap key.  This key is heavy and way bigger than I expected! Please see my picture of it - it is on my printer so you have a judge of the size!  We originally purchased it to lay on the table, but after seeing it we decided we wanted to hang it on our door - the key to our wine cellar! FUN, FUN, gift for just about any wine enthusiast!

Although I wasn't quite sure of what to expect, I was hoping that this would work for a 7 year old on the bottom bunk! She wants to be all grown up, but yet that need for a little light from time to time is also needed. She also wanted the new "big kid" look in her room. The days of Princess are leaving and butterflies and unicorns are entering the picture!  Be sure to have 3 AAA batteries on hand for when this arrives! As you can see by the pictures, it is pretty straight forward!  Open up the top, put in the batteries and let the light show begin.  I tried holding it in the closet so the pictures would come out better!  Nice and colorful and sure to bring a smile to any kids face!  As for quality, it's fine! It is actually nicer than I had expected!  So far, two weeks into it and our butterflies are alive and doing well hanging under the top bunk bed!  I have been given this product for free in exchange for an unbiased and fair review. If you have an questions, please feel free to ask! I'd be happy to take additional pictures if you like!

Like many of us, we need a bit of organization when the tots are in the car. I'm sorry, but the last thing I want is a tablet flying across the car or getting dropped.  The Carbors Backseat Organizer for Tablets is a great solution.  I have a Honda Pilot and as you can see in the pictures, it fits just fine. It has an easy clip that adjusts around your headrest and two ties that fit through the seat at the bottom. We ultimately opted not to use the bottom ties because we wanted it easy in/easy out. We don't always travel with a tablet.  The tablet area is roomy enough to fit an iPad Air with a Smart Cover on it. We also tossed in a Kindle Fire and a LeapPad and all fit just fine - one at a time, of course!  There are handy mesh pockets if you want to allow your child a space for small toys, crayons or even snacks.  The price point is a bit high, but overall, it does what it says it does! It keeps your child organized! We have owned it and have been using it for approximately two weeks and it has certainly done well with our crew!  Please note that I have been given this product free of charge in exchange for a fair and unbiased review. If you have any questions, please feel free to ask me.

Bots and Robbers Police Headquarters is similar to the Imaginext sets the kids love!  However, this is a really fun playset with a few additional bells and whistles!  Fun sounds as you transform your police station and get the police car ready to roll!  Watch the bank robber break open the safe. "Quick! Catch him! Let's put him behind bars where he belongs!"  The play set is two sided, so you can add figures on the top and up the ladder on the back!  I have taken pictures to show you what comes with your set . I have also taken a picture to show you some of our other figures that we have - to show you the proper scale! Please NOTE:  Your set comes only with the police station, police car and figure!  It is fun to add the other Bots as well!  Excellent price point!  This will make a great gift!

Back in the day, we raised Guide Dog puppies for The Seeing Eye and other service dog organizations.  At the time, we were told to feed our dogs Iam's and nothing else. That has certainly changed over the years as The Nutro Company has entered the playing field!Highlights:~ A trusted brand - 600 quality checks per day and FDA inspected.~ Tailor made for YOUR dog - puppy, small breed, large breed, etc.  This one is for Big Dogs! (101 lb Labrador in this house!)~  Larger chunks for your larger breed dog! We all know how fast they can eat, they at least have to slow down to chew this!~  Great tasting (so says Oakley!) and fine on the digestive system!Overall, we have been using this for about three weeks now. We gradually transitioned over and I came back today to order more. I like that my dog actually eats slower, apparently enjoys what he is eating and looks great!

The Dove Advanced Hair Series Shampoo (Youthful) leaves your hair not weighed down, but feeling moisturized and leaving it with a healthy shine.  Dove is a trusted brand in our house, so I was pleased to try yet another one of their products. We own several Dove products because they were originally recommended by the dermatologist many years ago. The fragrance is pleasant and it applies like any other shampoo.  My only reason for giving it 4 stars versus 5 stars is because I can't justify purchasing this and having yet another kind of shampoo in the house. I feel the shampoo and conditioner already being used does a similar job. However, I am planning on keeping this on hand for special occasions when I want that healthy shine!

I have to admit, I was skeptical. The one thing you don't mess with in our house is toilet paper. I grew up with Scott for how many years? When I married my husband, he was a Cottonelle user.  We probably should have switched brands all together, but this was not even worth an argument. So I switched and will sometimes buy both!  Now we have added a third brand to the competition - Charmin Ultra Strong Toilet Paper - Mega Roll.First Impressions:  My first observation (and complaint)  is that the Mega Rolls do not fit in our recessed toilet paper holders very well at all. They are a tight squeeze and you end up finding little pieces of toilet paper on the floor from the kids trying to get the roll started. I do like that there is more...but...  My second observation is that the Charmin was thinner than our current brand, which to me, means you need to use more to get the job done.The Test:  ~ No complaints by any family member! (Win! Win! If my husband doesn't complain, we are gold!)  ~ Strong, but soft - I did feel as though you needed more to accomplish the same task, so I'm not sure that "more" is helpful.  ~ See pictures below!Overall, I found the quality of Charmin Ultra Strong Toilet Paper to be decent! I wasn't disappointed as I thought I might be.  It does have a few shortcomings for our household, but that doesn't mean it won't be right for you. The price point is right in there with the rest, so this is up to personal preference.  I would definitely add this as a 3rd option when shopping for our house.  My husband is still winning with his "go to" brand!

I have to admit, I was a skeptic at first. I just didn't want another container that leaked or didn't do what it promised to do.  I was pleasantly surprised by the results.  First, give it a soapy wash and then fill with your beverage of choice. Of course, my son had to make lemonade for his lemonade stand!  It was pretty awesome to watch just how much this could hold. It held so much, he couldn't lift it. ;-)  Just note:  It may list slightly to one side if you fill it high. If you let some of the air out, it is fine!See pictures of our filled lemonade stand beverage dispenser!  Overall a 4 star review!  The only reason for 4 star versus 5 star is that I feel the price point is a bit higher than I would like to pay for this type of dispenser. Please note that I have been given this product for free in exchange for a fair and unbiased review.

Dr. Marcum sheds a much needed spotlight on the growing problem of the misuse of pharmaceuticals in medical practice today that often result in death or a worsening of the patient's condition. Too many individuals have been sold on prescription medicine as a wonderful panacea that excuses them from any responsibility in their healing. Marcum calls for every individual to take personal responsibility in knowing exactly what kind of medications they are putting into their bodies, the risks, side effects and the alternatives, rather than blindly taking medications they know nothing about. The educated medical patient is the one, Marcum insists, who greatly lowers the risk of harm or even death when taking prescription medications, and he backs up his claims with countless examples of how medicines can kill when used wrongly or without exercising caution.

Terrorism in the 21st century take many different forms. And author Altman does an excellent job of examining just how far one society will go in changing its long-time values and its very structure in order to accommodate the cultural concerns of a small, but very vocal, minority. Although the action in this suspenseful thriller is set in the UK, readers will no doubt see many very familiar parallels with what is currently happening in the U.S. This is the kind of book that is fun for book clubs and friends to read at the same time, because it will no doubt spark plenty of conversation after the final page is turned.

The Bit 360 is an all-inclusive screwdriver unit that features six different bits, all of which can be changed without your having to manually insert the bit into the screwdriver head. You can change the bit size quickly and easily simply by twisting the bit compartment and then locking the new bit into place. There is no more searching through a messby toolbox to find bit heads or another screwdriver, and this easy to operate screwdriver is great for individuals who tend to be all thumbs or who have arthritis in their hands and fingers and lack the manual dexterity to change from one bit to another. The screwdriver feels solid in your hand while you are using it, and the rubberized grip prevents your hand from slipping. Bit 360 also allows you to load bits you already own into the chamber, as long as the bit is longer than 1" 1/8 inch. We received Bit 360 at no charge for the purposes of this review and it's already become a valuable part of our toolbox. It's easy to operate, versatile and saves time by eliminating the search for multiple screwdrivers and/or bits because everything you need is contained in this one unit.

With adult coloring books all the rage now, "Don't Quit Your Day Dream" is a sophisticated entry into that creative category. The 20 tear-out cards included in this book each contain an inspirational thought or illustration, ready for you to get to work with crayon, colored ink or colored pencils to make an original masterpiece. The back of each card has a frame surrounding blank space, which could be utilized to send your completed creation as a post card (with appropriate postage, of course!). We're only sorry the book doesn't already come equipped with a few crayons to get you started!

Lovers of great literature will be intrigued by this eclectic mix of artwork celebrating of the giants in the book world, from Louisa May Alcott's Little Women to Alice's Adventures in Wonderland and The Adventures of Sherlock Holmes. Each of the pages can be removed from the book for framing purposes. A lovely treat for any bibliophile or a thoughtful gift for a book-loving friend!

We absolutely LOVE cookbooks that offer inspiration for getting nutritious and delicious meals on the table fast and with as few ingredients and steps as possible. The Two-Step Diabetes Cookbook fits this bill perfectly, and although its target audience are those who are watching their food intake due to diabetic conditions, the recipes are so versatile and delicious, this proves to be a great cookbook for anyone who loves delicious food. Most of the recipes come with a helpful cook's tip at the end and range from breakfast  Ham & Swiss Savory French Toast to a dinner-worthy Ham, Potato and Green Pea Casserole. And how about an Italian Meatloaf that takes only 2 minutes to mix? Kudos to Hughes for this gift of 150 easy and pleasing healthy recipes!

So many reasons to love this whimsical musical charm which you can hang directly on your car's rearview mirror -- it's made in the USA, is a beautifully crafted, detailed work of art that also enables you to enjoy chime music throughout the day, and it's an affordable gift for treating yourself or someone you care about. Don't forget that the holiday season is right around the corner. These car charms, available in 28 different designs, make great stocking stuffers!

If your reading preference is a novel filled with interesting plot twists, well-defined characters you can care about, in a contemporary setting, The Conciliators is the book for you. Kaufman has created a suspenseful page-turner with more than a few surprises in store for the reader prior to the final climactic chapters.

These gorgeous studs really make a fashion statement! We like their size because they are meant to be noticed. We have worn smaller carat round zircon studs, but found that we prefer these much larger, bold and beautiful earrings. They are an earring you will wear for any occasion, day in and day out.

Hynes writes with such detailed description and passion that the reader feels like he right there next to him in the hot and hellish killing fields of Vietnam. The title refers to how most veterans of this misguided war respond when asked to describe what went on. Hynes manages to take the reader front and center into all of the madness, comraderie, pain and horror that were all facets of this dedicated Marine's experience.

This entertaining novel fits into what I call a "slice of life" category. The reader transports you to the High Sierras and invites you to experience the comings and goings in a particular community designed by and populated by flying enthusiasts. The characters are well developed and hold the reader's interest, and the action moves along at a steady pace. We enjoyed being a "fly on the wall" of Weeks Mountain and think you will, too.

This book of 200 stickers features about 50 different cat faces and poses to brighten the day of any feline fancier, with emotions ranging from cranky, mad and sad to confused, sleepy, happy and groovy. You can use Emoticats to decorate stationary and envelopes, make personal notes, cover up price tags on gift items, or to dress up mirrors, closets, lockers, bookbags and other places and items you use every day and need a good laugh or a smile. This sticker collection is also a great gift for crafters. We hope Ulysses comes out with something similar to promote dogs!

It's hard to believe that cubic zirconia could create such beauty and sparkle because only you will know that his fabulous set doesn't feature real diamonds. This is a very stunning set that feels very luxurious to slip onto your finger and looks very expensive. Adding to the beauty of this set is the use of stones channel set into the wedding band as well as alongside the engagement ring's round-cut central stone. Any lady will feel very cherished and very married wearing this gorgeous duo!

This collection of tickets which tear out of the book are the perfect way to get the conversation going again after you've screwed up. And the expressions featured on each of the 20 different pugs used to say "I'm sorry" are priceless and are sure to bring a smile to the recipient, regardless of the faux paus you've commited.
